name: connect-mongo-session-store
description: An implementation of  connect session store with MongoDB. It also support passport authentication automatically.
readme:
# connect-mongo-session-store

## An implementation of connect session store with MongoDb.
    * It also support passport authentication automatically.
    * Specified https://github.com/senchalabs/connect/blob/master/lib/middleware/session/store.js

## Installation

    $ npm install connect-mongo-session-store

## Usage

    var express = require('express'),
    sessionStore = require("connect-mongo-session-store")(express),
    app = express(),
    server = http.createServer(app),
    sessionStore = new sessionStore({
        host: 'localhost',
        port: 27017,
        db: 'mydb',
        stringify: false,
        maxAge: 60 * 60 * 1000,
        autoRemoveExpiredSession: true
    });
    app.use(express.session({
        secret: 'mlpi',
        key: 'mlpi.sid',
        cookie: {
          path: '/',
          domain: '',
          httpOnly: true,
          maxAge: 60 * 60 * 1000
        },
        store: sessionStore
    }));
